      public double kellyCriteriaStake(double myDecimal, double fairPercent)
      Parameters:
      myDecimal - your odds for a particular bet
      fairPercent - the fair value of the bet
      Returns:
      how much you should bet based off of the kelly criteria formula

    • calcProfit

      public double calcProfit(int odds, double stake)
      Parameters:
      odds - the final odds of a bet
      stake - how much you are placing on the bet
      Returns:
      returns the profit amount if the bet wins
